title: Inferno: A Novel
description: INFERNO is the debut novel by B. R. Bevins, a "dark and imaginative" science fiction adventure that will thrill readers from beginning to end.It's been a long few years at space, and the crew of the USF Inferno are relieved that they can finally return home. Just before initiating their hyperspace jump, the ship decodes a distress beacon, sent from their allies aboard the USF Empyrean.Unable to ignore the pleas of their comrades, the crew of the Inferno jump into action, bracing themselves for the battle that lies ahead. They are stunned to find their sister vessel in pieces, only ship debris and floating bodies of crew members left from what was clearly a one-sided encounter with the enemy. But all is not as it seems - without warning, the Inferno is attacked by a cloaked enemy fighter and forced to retreat into an uncharted area of space, narrowly escaping the clutches of death.What they could not have known is that although they've avoided the present threat, something else... something more sinister was lying in wait.In order to survive, and make it back home, the small crew of the Inferno will have to dig deep, and look for resolve within themselves... although they may not like what they find...
author: B.R. Bevins
